action_modal.details: For bookings made on or after April 6, 2020, be sure to consider the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) and associated government measures. If you dont book a flexible rate, you may not be entitled to a refund. Your cancellation request will be handled by the property, based on your chosen policy and consumer law where applicable. During times of uncertainty, we recommend booking an option with free cancellation. If your plans change, you can cancel free of charge until free cancellation expires.
action_modal.title: Check your booking conditions

banner.subtitle: We recommend booking an option with free cancellation in case your travel plans change.
banner.title: As of April 6, 2020, your chosen cancellation policy will apply, regardless of the coronavirus.

hotel_text.important_information:
In accordance to Vietnamese law and regulations, foreign guests who wish to share a room with a local are required to provide a proof of marriage. Should they not be able to provide one, a second room must be booked. Otherwise, the property reserves the right to reject the booking.

Please present the same credit card used to guarantee your booking when checking in & making payment at the hotel.

The name on the credit card used for the booking must correspond to the guest staying at the property.

Please note that hotel may contact the cardholder for verification purpose.

Food and beverage services at this property may be limited or unavailable due to the coronavirus (COVID-19). Due to the coronavirus (COVID-19), wearing a face mask is mandatory in all indoor common areas. Guests are required to show a photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply. Sauna is closed from Tue, May 04, 2021 until Mon, May 31, 2021 Fitness center is closed from Fri, May 07, 2021 until Tue, Jun 15, 2021 Spa/wellness center is closed from Tue, May 04, 2021 until Mon, May 31, 2021

policies.content: You can cancel free of charge until 1 day before arrival. You'll be charged the total price of the reservation if you cancel within 1 day before arrival.

All children are welcome. One child under 6 years stays free of charge when using existing beds.
One child from 6 to 12 years is charged VND 71000  per night when using existing beds.
One older child or adult is charged VND 353000  per night in an extra bed.
The maximum number of extra beds in a room is 1.
The maximum number of total guests in a room is 3.
There is no capacity for cribs in the room.
Any type of extra bed is upon request and needs to be confirmed by management.
Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge.
You'll be charged a prepayment of the total price at any time.
The property reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards prior to arrival.
10 % VAT is included. 5 % Service charge is included. A City tax is not applicable.
items: A City tax is not applicable.

messages: Check for travel restrictions. Travel might only be permitted for certain purposes, and touristic travel in particular may not be allowed.
info_banners.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) support
